column2: Commander, our covert forces are poised to seize a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} prison facility where a large number of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} personnel are being held prisoner. However, the facility is protected by a nearby military base, and as soon as we seize the prison, they'll move against it, and reduce those buildings to rubble before they let us extract those people. We'll be moving our own 'Mechs and Leopards in as quickly as we can but before we can land them and extract the personnel, we need you to pacify that military base.
column3: Commander, our covert forces are poised to seize a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} prison facility where a large number of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} personnel are being held prisoner. However, the facility is protected by a nearby military base, and as soon as we seize the prison, they'll move against it, and reduce those buildings to rubble before they let us extract those people. We'll be moving our own 'Mechs and Leopards in as quickly as we can but before we can land them and extract the personnel, we need you to pacify that military base.

column3: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.

column2: Hey, boss, I hate to bring bad news, but I've got eyes on enemy units surrounding their base. Looks like you're gonna have to shoot your way through.
column3: Hey, boss, I hate to bring bad news, but I've got eyes on enemy units surrounding their base. Looks like you're gonna have to shoot your way through.

column2: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.
column3: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.

column2: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!
column3: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!

column2: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!
column3: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!

column2: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]
column3: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]

column2: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, I'm scrubbing the contract.
column3: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, I'm scrubbing the contract.

column2: I'm guessing these 'civilians' are some kind of covert operatives, for this much metal to be put on the field to extract them.

column2: Defend the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Base
column3: Defend the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} Base

column2: Keep all friendly structures standing
column3: Keep all friendly structures standing

column2: Commander, this is an extremely time-sensitive mission and we're on a strict deadline, so I hope you can assist us. Our covert forces are poised to seize a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility where a large number of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} civilians are being held prisoner. However, the facility is protected by a nearby military base, and as soon as we seize the prison, they'll move against it, and reduce those buildings to rubble before they let us extract those people. We'll be moving our own 'Mechs and Leopards in as quickly as we can but before we can land them and extract the civilians, we need you to pacify that military base.
column3: Commander, this is an extremely time-sensitive mission and we're on a strict deadline, so I hope you can assist us. Our covert forces are poised to seize a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} facility where a large number of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} civilians are being held prisoner. However, the facility is protected by a nearby military base, and as soon as we seize the prison, they'll move against it, and reduce those buildings to rubble before they let us extract those people. We'll be moving our own 'Mechs and Leopards in as quickly as we can but before we can land them and extract the civilians, we need you to pacify that military base.

column2: High Tide
column3: High Tide

column2: We're entering the AO, boss, and my board just lit up like a Christmas tree. There's a whole lot of hostiles down there, folks.
column3: We're entering the AO, boss, and my board just lit up like a Christmas tree. There's a whole lot of hostiles down there, folks.

column2: Acknowledged, Meyer. Commander, I'm guessing the attack on the logistical base is already underway. We need to get down there and intercept their vanguard.
column3: Acknowledged, Meyer. Commander, I'm guessing the attack on the logistical base is already underway. We need to get down there and intercept their vanguard.

column2: They'll keep coming for our employer's facility; the only way we stop the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} attack is to destroy the base they're staging from.
column3: They'll keep coming for our employer's facility; the only way we stop the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} attack is to destroy the base they're staging from.

column2: We've got friendly turrets covering the base but those will only delay, not stop, the assault. Stopping it is our job.
column3: We've got friendly turrets covering the base but those will only delay, not stop, the assault. Stopping it is our job.

column2: Once the base is destroyed, Commander, you'll be free to evac, or clean up the stragglers; your call.
column3: Once the base is destroyed, Commander, you'll be free to evac, or clean up the stragglers; your call.

column2: I'll meet you here, Commander, and make the pick-up. Don't keep me waiting.
column3: I'll meet you here, Commander, and make the pick-up. Don't keep me waiting.

column2: Thanks for the assist, Argo. We've got it from here.
column3: Thanks for the assist, Argo. We've got it from here.

column2: That's a wrap, Commander. We'll debrief back in orbit.
column3: That's a wrap, Commander. We'll debrief back in orbit.

column2: That's the last of them, Commander; the enemy base has been destroyed.
column3: That's the last of them, Commander; the enemy base has been destroyed.

column2: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.
column3: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.

column2: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.
column3: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.

column2: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base secure.
column3: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base secure.

column2: I'm not seeing any more hostiles in the area. Looks like a clean sweep, boss.
column3: I'm not seeing any more hostiles in the area. Looks like a clean sweep, boss.

column2: Move in to make the pickup, Meyer. Commander, your evac zone is here.
column3: Move in to make the pickup, Meyer. Commander, your evac zone is here.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.
column3: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.

column2: Looks like our {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have arrived. You'll need to get them shooting at the target facility.
column3: Looks like our {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} friends have arrived. You'll need to get them shooting at the target facility.

column2: Um, XO, are you sure about this? You see the size of those 'Mechs?!
column3: Um, XO, are you sure about this? You see the size of those 'Mechs?!

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.
column3: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.
column3: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.

column2: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} has landed nearby.
column3: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has landed nearby.

column2: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.
column3: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.

column2: Boss, I've got a Leopard on approach, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} livery. I'm guessing reinforcements?
column3: Boss, I've got a Leopard on approach, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} livery. I'm guessing reinforcements?

column2: Confirmed. Commander, it's about to get hot down there.
column3: Confirmed. Commander, it's about to get hot down there.

column2: Scratch another target.
column3: Scratch another target.

column2: This was always going to be a long shot. Let's get clear of this, Commander.
column3: This was always going to be a long shot. Let's get clear of this, Commander.

column2: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.
column3: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.

column2: Leopard inbound, boss. Looks like more {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units on the field.
column3: Leopard inbound, boss. Looks like more {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} units on the field.

column2: As long as that facility is still standing, they're going to keep trying to defend it and secure that research data.
column3: As long as that facility is still standing, they're going to keep trying to defend it and secure that research data.

column2: More {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units, Commander. I'm ready to pull you out of there if you need it.
column3: More {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} units, Commander. I'm ready to pull you out of there if you need it.

column2: That's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard dropping off another lance, boss. Getting kinda messy down there.
column3: That's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Leopard dropping off another lance, boss. Getting kinda messy down there.

column2: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.
column3: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.

column2: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.
column3: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.

column2: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: Boss, I'm seeing turrets powering up. Big ones. Holy shit.
column3: Boss, I'm seeing turrets powering up. Big ones. Holy shit.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.

column2: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.
column3: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.

column2: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.
column3: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.

column2: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.
column3: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.

column2: Some of the enemy forces are hanging back at their base, presumably to defend it from us.
column3: Some of the enemy forces are hanging back at their base, presumably to defend it from us.

column2: Good kill, Commander.
column3: Good kill, Commander.

column2: The friendly facility is under fire, Commander. If we lose it, the mission is scrubbed.
column3: The friendly facility is under fire, Commander. If we lose it, the mission is scrubbed.

column2: Commander, they took out one of the facility's structures. You need to draw those hostiles off our base.
column3: Commander, they took out one of the facility's structures. You need to draw those hostiles off our base.

column2: Commander, if we lose another building, this mission is over.
column3: Commander, if we lose another building, this mission is over.

column2: A 'major' force sounds like a whole lot of metal on the field. Expect a long slog, Commander, and maybe pack lasers instead of autocannons.
column3: A 'major' force sounds like a whole lot of metal on the field. Expect a long slog, Commander, and maybe pack lasers instead of autocannons.

column3: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Base

column2: Commander, we need your assistance in fending off an attack on one of our facilities. This base is a critical logistical center for us, primarily for food and medicine; if we lose it, our forces in the region will be hamstrung. A major {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} strike force has deployed to the region, and we've just gotten word that they've seized an auxiliary base near the logistics facility, and are using it as a staging point for a further assault. We need you to level that auxiliary base and cut off their offensive.
column3: Commander, we need your assistance in fending off an attack on one of our facilities. This base is a critical logistical center for us, primarily for food and medicine; if we lose it, our forces in the region will be hamstrung. A major {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} strike force has deployed to the region, and we've just gotten word that they've seized an auxiliary base near the logistics facility, and are using it as a staging point for a further assault. We need you to level that auxiliary base and cut off their offensive.

column2: Breakout
column3: Breakout

column2: Right! We've taken control of the facility. Our evacuation DropShips are ready to start the evacuation once you've destroyed that base.
column3: Right! We've taken control of the facility. Our evacuation DropShips are ready to start the evacuation once you've destroyed that base.

column2: Acknowledged. Meyer, how much time have we got before the military base responds?
column3: Acknowledged. Meyer, how much time have we got before the military base responds?

column2: None. They're already inbound and they seem unhappy.
column3: None. They're already inbound and they seem unhappy.

column2: Commander, they're going to keep sending 'Mechs at us until they destroy this base. You'll need to get their attention or they'll bury the prisoners in rubble.
column3: Commander, they're going to keep sending 'Mechs at us until they destroy this base. You'll need to get their attention or they'll bury the prisoners in rubble.

column2: The good news is that once you take out the military facility, they'll have no eyes on their LZ, so they'll have to stop landing more forces.
column3: The good news is that once you take out the military facility, they'll have no eyes on their LZ, so they'll have to stop landing more forces.

column2: You could also say 'the bad news is they'll keep landing reinforcements the whole time.' Commander, I'll move in for a pickup once you get that base flattened. Don't keep me waiting.
column3: You could also say 'the bad news is they'll keep landing reinforcements the whole time.' Commander, I'll move in for a pickup once you get that base flattened. Don't keep me waiting.

column2: We've got it from here, Argo. Thanks for the help.
column3: We've got it from here, Argo. Thanks for the help.

column2: Another job well done.
column3: Another job well done.

column2: That's the last structure, Commander. That should slow down the attackers. Meyer, are you ready for pickup?

column2: Affirmative, XO. Let's get out of here, boss.

column2: Some of our favorite people are currently being held in a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} prison facility. We'd like to break them out and evacuate them, but the prison's protected by a nearby military base. We're very competent at prison breaks, but less experienced at defending bases from lances of military 'Mechs. That's where you come in! We'll seize control of the prison, and then you land and shoot anyone who tries to keep us from evacuating our dear friends. In fact, it would probably be best if you simply destroyed their base entirely. Wouldn't do to have them tracking us!
column3: Some of our favorite people are currently being held in a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} prison facility. We'd like to break them out and evacuate them, but the prison's protected by a nearby military base. We're very competent at prison breaks, but less experienced at defending bases from lances of military 'Mechs. That's where you come in! We'll seize control of the prison, and then you land and shoot anyone who tries to keep us from evacuating our dear friends. In fact, it would probably be best if you simply destroyed their base entirely. Wouldn't do to have them tracking us!

column3: Keep all friendly structures standing

column2: We've been able to infiltrate personnel into a contested region to take control of an abandoned base. We've brought the base's primary power and communications systems online, but in doing so, we've made an unfortunate discovery: a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} force has done the same thing with a nearby facility. They're somewhat ahead of us in the process, and have their base's turrets online; they're also landing troops and 'Mechs to hold their new acquisition. Only one of us can control this area when we're finished; we'd like you to ensure that it's us.
column3: We've been able to infiltrate personnel into a contested region to take control of an abandoned base. We've brought the base's primary power and communications systems online, but in doing so, we've made an unfortunate discovery: a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} force has done the same thing with a nearby facility. They're somewhat ahead of us in the process, and have their base's turrets online; they're also landing troops and 'Mechs to hold their new acquisition. Only one of us can control this area when we're finished; we'd like you to ensure that it's us.

column2: Proxy War
column3: Proxy War

column2: We're expecting the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to begin their assault on this facility at any moment. If they destroy it, our employers lose their eyes on the operational area; they'll scrub the mission at that point.
column3: We're expecting the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} forces to begin their assault on this facility at any moment. If they destroy it, our employers lose their eyes on the operational area; they'll scrub the mission at that point.

column2: So here's the plan. We're going to hold the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} force and keep them busy, and well away from the friendly facility. Meanwhile, a {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} strike force will be inbound to the AO.
column3: So here's the plan. We're going to hold the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} force and keep them busy, and well away from the friendly facility. Meanwhile, a {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} strike force will be inbound to the AO.

column2: Once they land, they'll engage everyone -- friendly and hostile -- and generally stir up trouble. The goal is to get them to take the brunt of the enemy fire; we move in and clean up the mess afterwards.
column3: Once they land, they'll engage everyone -- friendly and hostile -- and generally stir up trouble. The goal is to get them to take the brunt of the enemy fire; we move in and clean up the mess afterwards.

column2: The number one priority is to destroy that base. Once it's gone, the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} brass will call off the assault, and we'll be clear to evac. Questions?
column3: The number one priority is to destroy that base. Once it's gone, the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} brass will call off the assault, and we'll be clear to evac. Questions?

column2: Yeah, whose bullshit idea was this, anyway?
column3: Yeah, whose bullshit idea was this, anyway?

column2: Not helpful, Meyer. Stay on station to make the pickup once the base is down. Commander... good luck.
column3: Not helpful, Meyer. Stay on station to make the pickup once the base is down. Commander... good luck.

column2: Oh thank God. Commander, that's the friendly reinforcements. We can leave whenever you're ready.
column3: Oh thank God. Commander, that's the friendly reinforcements. We can leave whenever you're ready.

column2: I'll pick you up at the designated LZ.
column3: I'll pick you up at the designated LZ.

column2: That's it, Commander. The enemy base has been destroyed.
column3: That's it, Commander. The enemy base has been destroyed.

column2: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.
column3: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.

column2: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.
column3: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.

column2: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base secure.
column3: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base secure.

column2: I'm not seeing any more hostiles in the area. Looks like a clean sweep, boss.
column3: I'm not seeing any more hostiles in the area. Looks like a clean sweep, boss.

column2: Move in to make the pickup, Meyer. Commander, your evac zone is here.
column3: Move in to make the pickup, Meyer. Commander, your evac zone is here.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.
column3: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.

column2: Looks like our {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} friends have arrived. You'll need to get them shooting at the target facility.
column3: Looks like our {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} friends have arrived. You'll need to get them shooting at the target facility.

column2: Um, XO, are you sure about this? You see the size of those 'Mechs?!
column3: Um, XO, are you sure about this? You see the size of those 'Mechs?!

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.
column3: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.

column3: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.

column2: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} has landed nearby.
column3: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has landed nearby.

column2: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.
column3: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.

column2: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} has landed nearby.
column3: A lance of hostile {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has landed nearby.

column2: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.
column3: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.

column2: Scratch another target.
column3: Scratch another target.

column2: This was always going to be a long shot. Let's get clear of this, Commander.
column3: This was always going to be a long shot. Let's get clear of this, Commander.

column2: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.
column3: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.

column2: Leopard inbound, boss. Looks like more {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units on the field.
column3: Leopard inbound, boss. Looks like more {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} units on the field.

column2: As long as that facility is still standing, they're going to keep trying to defend it and secure that research data.
column3: As long as that facility is still standing, they're going to keep trying to defend it and secure that research data.

column2: More {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units, Commander. Just uh, just let me know if you need me to pull you out of there.
column3: More {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} units, Commander. Just uh, just let me know if you need me to pull you out of there.

column2: That's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard dropping off another lance, boss. Getting kinda messy down there.
column3: That's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Leopard dropping off another lance, boss. Getting kinda messy down there.

column2: Commander, we have a developing situation and need an unorthodox solution, which we're hoping your team can provide. Six hours ago, a heavily-armed {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} strike force landed near one of our research facilities and took control of it. That facility is stuffed with critical intelligence and research data, all of which is being accessed and transmitted off-planet right now. We simply don't have enough local firepower to dislodge them. We've got a plan, though. We're going to bait a third party into helping us destroy the base and its intel. You're the bait.
column3: Commander, we have a developing situation and need an unorthodox solution, which we're hoping your team can provide. Six hours ago, a heavily-armed {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} strike force landed near one of our research facilities and took control of it. That facility is stuffed with critical intelligence and research data, all of which is being accessed and transmitted off-planet right now. We simply don't have enough local firepower to dislodge them. We've got a plan, though. We're going to bait a third party into helping us destroy the base and its intel. You're the bait.

column2: Reconquest
column3: Reconquest

column2: Welcome to the party, Argo. Glad you could give us a hand.
column3: Welcome to the party, Argo. Glad you could give us a hand.

column2: Happy to help out. Commander, we're tasked with taking down a base that's been captured by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} terrorists.
column3: Happy to help out. Commander, we're tasked with taking down a base that's been captured by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} terrorists.

column2: Before we get there, however, you'll need to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} lance closing on our position.
column3: Before we get there, however, you'll need to intercept the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} lance closing on our position.

column2: We'll have some backup in the form of defensive turrets, but they won't last long against actual 'Mechs. You'll need to make sure to keep the enemy's attention, or they'll destroy the friendly facility.
column3: We'll have some backup in the form of defensive turrets, but they won't last long against actual 'Mechs. You'll need to make sure to keep the enemy's attention, or they'll destroy the friendly facility.

column2: The only way to stop the attacks entirely is to break their command and control -- which means taking down that enemy facility. That should be your priority.
column3: The only way to stop the attacks entirely is to break their command and control -- which means taking down that enemy facility. That should be your priority.

column2: I'll be on station, Commander. Once that base is rubble, I'll meet you at this LZ.
column3: I'll be on station, Commander. Once that base is rubble, I'll meet you at this LZ.

column2: Thanks for the assist, Argo. We can take things from here.
column3: Thanks for the assist, Argo. We can take things from here.

column2: Let's pack it up, folks. Commander, we'll debrief back in orbit.
column3: Let's pack it up, folks. Commander, we'll debrief back in orbit.

column2: Boom! Good kill, boss!
column3: Boom! Good kill, boss!

column2: Meyer, cut the chatter and get ready for the pickup.
column3: Meyer, cut the chatter and get ready for the pickup.

column2: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.
column3: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.

column2: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.
column3: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.

column2: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base secure.
column3: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base secure.

column2: Uh, Commander, I'm not seeing any more blips out there. I think you killed everything.
column3: Uh, Commander, I'm not seeing any more blips out there. I think you killed everything.

column2: Well, that's one way to protect a facility. Commander, there's a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} lance ready to relieve you.
column3: Well, that's one way to protect a facility. Commander, there's a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} lance ready to relieve you.

column2: When you're ready to extract, Sumire will pick you up at this location.
column3: When you're ready to extract, Sumire will pick you up at this location.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.
column3: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: If we destroy them we'll get a hefty bonus.
column3: If we destroy them we'll get a hefty bonus.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.
column3: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.
column3: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.

column2: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} dropship!
column3: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} dropship!

column2: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.
column3: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.

column2: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} dropship!
column3: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} dropship!

column2: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.
column3: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.

column2: Scratch another target.
column3: Scratch another target.

column2: Well, that didn't go as planned. Let's debrief back on the Argo, Commander.
column3: Well, that didn't go as planned. Let's debrief back on the Argo, Commander.

column2: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.
column3: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.

column2: Shit. Commander, a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard just dropped another lance into the AO.
column3: Shit. Commander, a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Leopard just dropped another lance into the AO.

column2: They seem fairly determined to hold this facility. We need to hurry before even more of them show up.
column3: They seem fairly determined to hold this facility. We need to hurry before even more of them show up.

column2: Boss, that's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} lance in the field. Getting kinda crowded down there.
column3: Boss, that's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} lance in the field. Getting kinda crowded down there.

column2: Well, the good news is that I don't see any more inbound DropShips... the bad news is that's another enemy lance.
column3: Well, the good news is that I don't see any more inbound DropShips... the bad news is that's another enemy lance.

column2: Watch out commander, more hostiles are arriving. They'll be landing in this area.
column3: Watch out commander, more hostiles are arriving. They'll be landing in this area.

column2: Watch out commander, more hostiles are arriving. They'll be landing in this area.
column3: Watch out commander, more hostiles are arriving. They'll be landing in this area.

column2: Commander, we've got a lance of enemy forces moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got a lance of enemy forces moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: They're coming in fast, don't let them get too close.
column3: They're coming in fast, don't let them get too close.

column2: Commander, we've got a lance of enemy forces moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got a lance of enemy forces moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: They're coming in fast, don't let them get too close.
column3: They're coming in fast, don't let them get too close.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: There's those base defenses, Commander. Looks like the terrorists got the base's turrets powered up.
column3: There's those base defenses, Commander. Looks like the terrorists got the base's turrets powered up.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.

column2: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.
column3: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.

column2: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.
column3: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.

column2: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.
column3: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.

column2: Commander, they've got units spread out around the target facility. If we clean them out, our employers won't have to; they're offering a bonus. It's your call.
column3: Commander, they've got units spread out around the target facility. If we clean them out, our employers won't have to; they're offering a bonus. It's your call.

column2: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.
column3: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.

column2: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!
column3: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!

column2: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!
column3: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!

column2: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]
column3: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]

column2: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, we're scrubbing the contract.
column3: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, we're scrubbing the contract.

column2: We've got to intercept 'Mechs, destroy a base, save a base... and there are base defense systems? Sounds like a mess.
column3: We've got to intercept 'Mechs, destroy a base, save a base... and there are base defense systems? Sounds like a mess.

column2: Commander, we've just received a distress signal from one of our facilities on the planet. A team of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} terrorists have seized control of the primary base, executed the base commander, and subverted the base's defense systems. Satellite imagery tells us they're preparing for an assault on the secondary base. We need a rapid response force to eliminate their assault team, and level the seized base. Our own forces are inbound but won't get there in time to save the secondary base.
column3: Commander, we've just received a distress signal from one of our facilities on the planet. A team of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} terrorists have seized control of the primary base, executed the base commander, and subverted the base's defense systems. Our own forces are inbound but won't get there in time to save the secondary base.

column2: Boom! Good kill, boss!

column2: Meyer, cut the chatter and get ready for the pickup.
column3: Meyer, cut the chatter and get ready for the pickup.

column2: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.
column3: Commander, we've completed all the primary objectives and you're clear to extract.

column2: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.
column3: I'm on station to pick you up here whenever you're ready, boss.

column2: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base secure.
column3: As long as you're still in the AO, Commander, you'll need to keep the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base secure.

column2: Uh, Commander, I'm not seeing any more blips out there. I think you killed everything.
column3: Uh, Commander, I'm not seeing any more blips out there. I think you killed everything.

column2: Well, that's one way to protect a facility. Commander, there's a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} lance ready to relieve you.
column3: Well, that's one way to protect a facility. Commander, there's a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} lance ready to relieve you.

column2: When you're ready to extract, Sumire will pick you up at this location.
column3: When you're ready to extract, Sumire will pick you up at this location.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.
column3: We'll have to destroy that lance if we want to complete the mission.

column2: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!
column3: Heads up, commander, a lance of {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} units just entered the area. They're hostile to everyone!

column2: If we destroy them we'll get a hefty bonus.
column3: If we destroy them we'll get a hefty bonus.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.
column3: Our employer is saying we NEED to kill those units. Prepare to engage.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} units in the area. Our target brought in allies for backup.

column2: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.
column3: If we decide to kill these units our employer if offering a bonus.

column2: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} dropship!
column3: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} dropship!

column2: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.
column3: Our employer wants us to kill these guys. This mission isn't ending until they die.

column2: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} dropship!
column3: Incoming {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} dropship!

column2: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.
column3: Our employer is offering us some extra cash if we destroy these units too.

column2: Scratch another target.
column3: Scratch another target.

column2: Well, that didn't go as planned. Let's debrief back on the Argo, Commander.
column3: Well, that didn't go as planned. Let's debrief back on the Argo, Commander.

column2: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.
column3: Good job, commander. All primary objectives complete. Get to evac, Sumire will pick you up here.

column2: Shit. Commander, a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Leopard just dropped another lance into the AO.
column3: Shit. Commander, a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Leopard just dropped another lance into the AO.

column2: They seem fairly determined to hold this facility. We need to hurry before even more of them show up.
column3: They seem fairly determined to hold this facility. We need to hurry before even more of them show up.

column2: Boss, that's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} lance in the field. Getting kinda crowded down there.
column3: Boss, that's another {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} lance in the field. Getting kinda crowded down there.

column2: Well, the good news is that I don't see any more inbound DropShips... the bad news is that's another enemy lance.
column3: Well, the good news is that I don't see any more inbound DropShips... the bad news is that's another enemy lance.

column2: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.
column3: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.

column2: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.
column3: Commander, more hostiles are entering the area. I've marked their LZ.

column2: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
column3: Commander, we've got an enemy lance moving towards the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} base.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: There's those base defenses, Commander. Looks like the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces got the base's turrets powered up.
column3: There's those base defenses, Commander. Looks like the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} forces got the base's turrets powered up.

column2: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound to this location.
column3: Commander, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound to this location.

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has provided some of their own forces to support us.

column2: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.
column3: They're here to defend their base and will engage any hostiles that get too close.

column2: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.
column3: Commander, the employer's base is under attack! Our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} allies will stay close to the base to defend it.

column2: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.
column3: Commander, I'm seeing hostile defenders surrounding the enemy base.

column2: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.
column3: We can't complete the contract until those units are destroyed.

column2: Commander, they've got units spread out around the target facility. If we clean them out, our employers won't have to; they're offering a bonus. It's your call.
column3: Commander, they've got units spread out around the target facility. If we clean them out, our employers won't have to; they're offering a bonus. It's your call.

column2: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.
column3: That's the first target structure down, Commander. Keep up the pressure.

column2: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!
column3: Argo, our facility is taking fire over here. We need you to draw that fire off, or we're dead!

column2: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!
column3: Argo, we've lost one of our structures. You've got to move faster, or we'll lose them all!

column2: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]
column3: Argo, we're under heavy-- [static]-- hold out-- [static]

column2: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, we're scrubbing the contract.
column3: Dammit! Commander, we've only got one building left. If it goes down, we're scrubbing the contract.

column2: We've got to intercept 'Mechs, assault a base, save a base; we've got our work cut out for us on this one, Commander.
column3: We've got to intercept 'Mechs, assault a base, save a base; we've got our work cut out for us on this one, Commander.

column3: Destroy the Captured Base

column2: Commander, one of our facilities has gone dark, and we're not sure why. The base is one of two {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facilities in the region. We have satellite imagery showing unknown 'Mechs moving in the area, and it seems as though they're preparing for an assault on the secondary base. We need you to put 'Mechs in the field, defend the secondary base, and drive them out of the primary base. Our own forces are inbound but won't get there in time to save the secondary base.
column3: Commander, one of our facilities has gone dark, and we're not sure why. The base is one of two {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} facilities in the region. We have satellite imagery showing unknown 'Mechs moving in the area, and it seems as though they're preparing for an assault on the secondary base. We need you to put 'Mechs in the field, defend the secondary base, and drive them out of the primary base. Our own forces are inbound but won't get there in time to save the secondary base.

column2: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared and the outpost is destroyed. I've been given the green light to evac you...
column3: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared and the outpost is destroyed. I've been given the green light to evac you...

column2: ...uh belay that last communication {COMMANDER.FirstName}. We've just received word that a lance of Pirate mechs escaped just before our arrival. Our employer wants you to intercept and take them out.
column3: ...uh belay that last communication {COMMANDER.FirstName}. We've just received word that a lance of Pirate mechs escaped just before our arrival. Our employer wants you to intercept and take them out.

column2: No time to come back for repairs. Sumire pick up the team and take them to the target location ASAP.
column3: No time to come back for repairs. Sumire pick up the team and take them to the target location ASAP.

column2: Roger that, Darius. Strap in Commander, we're back at it.
column3: Roger that, Darius. Strap in Commander, we're back at it.

column2: Commander, the area is clear and Sumire is in bound to pick you up..
column3: Commander, the area is clear and Sumire is in bound to pick you up..

column2: Be on site shortly Commander. But who the hell was that bounty hunter, and how did he find us?
column3: Be on site shortly Commander. But who the hell was that bounty hunter, and how did he find us?

column2: I don't know. But if I had to guess. I'd say our employer sold us out. Good thing those Pirates were more interested in saving their own skin than working in tandem with the other team.
column3: I don't know. But if I had to guess. I'd say our employer sold us out. Good thing those Pirates were more interested in saving their own skin than working in tandem with the other team.

column2: Well done! You defeated The Black Knight in single combat. That was an epic battle.
column3: Well done! You defeated The Black Knight in single combat. That was an epic battle.

column2: Commander I am inbound to pick you up. Hold tight.
column3: Commander I am inbound to pick you up. Hold tight.

column2: Well Fought. I've not had a fight like that in a long time Commander. I'll have the Avatar sent over to the Argo directly. Until we meet again.
column3: Well Fought. I've not had a fight like that in a long time Commander. I'll have the Avatar sent over to the Argo directly. Until we meet again.

column2: Well done! You managed to wipe The Black Knight's forces. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.
column3: Well done! You managed to wipe The Black Knight's forces. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.

column2: That was an epic battle, Commander. You've just secured us our very own Avatar.
column3: That was an epic battle, Commander. You've just secured us our very own Avatar.

column2: May not have been a clean fight. But combats are about winning not style. Drinks are on me Commander.
column3: May not have been a clean fight. But combats are about winning not style. Drinks are on me Commander.

column2: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared. Shows over. Time to head back to the showroom.
column3: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared. Shows over. Time to head back to the showroom.

column2: Commander, the area has been cleared. Head back to the showroom.
column3: Commander, the area has been cleared. Head back to the showroom.

column2: Excellent commander. You've kept my battlemech from being taken and in the Process given Mitchell Graves a nice bloody nose.
column3: Excellent commander. You've kept my battlemech from being taken and in the Process given Mitchell Graves a nice bloody nose.

column2: Perhaps you'll consider that in your final payment of the contract, Wallo. Commander, head back to the showroom so we can get our payout.
column3: Perhaps you'll consider that in your final payment of the contract, Wallo. Commander, head back to the showroom so we can get our payout.

column2: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFo out. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.
column3: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFo out. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.

column2: The Mackie is ours, commander. Can't wait to get my hands on her chassis.
column3: The Mackie is ours, commander. Can't wait to get my hands on her chassis.

column2: Thanks Yang. That is really not a visual I needed in my head.
column3: Thanks Yang. That is really not a visual I needed in my head.

column2: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared and the cargo is secure. Yang and Wallo's technicians are starting their inspection. You're clear to evac. I've give Sumire the green light to disengage and...
column3: Commander, all hostiles have been cleared and the cargo is secure. Yang and Wallo's technicians are starting their inspection. You're clear to evac. I've give Sumire the green light to disengage and...

column2: ...uh belay that last communication {COMMANDER.FirstName}. We've just received an urgent uplink request from Wallo. Patching you in now.
column3: ...uh belay that last communication {COMMANDER.FirstName}. We've just received an urgent uplink request from Wallo. Patching you in now.

column2: Commander, the facility is ours and Sumire is inbound with supplies.
column3: Commander, the facility is ours and Sumire is inbound with supplies.

column2: Excellent commander. Now get Mr Virtanen busy on my Annihilators.
column3: Excellent commander. Now get Mr Virtanen busy on my Annihilators.

column2: We're on it Wallo. Sit tight Commander. You should be able to evac shortly.
column3: We're on it Wallo. Sit tight Commander. You should be able to evac shortly.

column2: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFo out. I can do an extract right now. So get back to the facility so we can head out.
column3: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFo out. I can do an extract right now. So get back to the facility so we can head out.

column2: Commander, we're detecting AA guns powering up at a near by House Steiner Outpost. Don't think you'll be leaving anytime soon. Also I'm unable to reach Wallo. Sit tight while we figure this one out.
column3: Commander, we're detecting AA guns powering up at a near by House Steiner Outpost. Don't think you'll be leaving anytime soon. Also I'm unable to reach Wallo. Sit tight while we figure this one out.

column2: SHIT! No way we can take off now. We'd be sitting ducks for those guns.
column3: SHIT! No way we can take off now. We'd be sitting ducks for those guns.

column2: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFor out. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.
column3: Well done! You managed to wipe the OpFor out. I can do an extract right now, no need to get to our planned LZ.

column2: Two Annihilator for the price of one. We're taking home our own Lil Annie today, Commander
column3: Two Annihilator for the price of one. We're taking home our own Lil Annie today, Commander

column2: Lil Annie, Yang? Really? XO we're dusting off and on our way back. Inform the client.
column3: Lil Annie, Yang? Really? XO we're dusting off and on our way back. Inform the client.

column2: A Knight at the Omni I
column3: A Knight at the Omni I

column2: Our intel was right; there aren't any nearby reinforcements, but there are fixed gun emplacements.
column3: Our intel was right; there aren't any nearby reinforcements, but there are fixed gun emplacements.

column2: Move up, neutralize the turrets, and level that base.
column3: Move up, neutralize the turrets, and level that base.

column2: Watch out for that garrison, Commander. It's nothing too dangerous but every bit of damage costs. Oliveira out.
column3: Watch out for that garrison, Commander. It's nothing too dangerous but every bit of damage costs. Oliveira out.

column2: Well done, Commander. Let's dust off and go home.
column3: Well done, Commander. Let's dust off and go home.

column2: What a disaster. We'll debrief back at the ship.
column3: What a disaster. We'll debrief back at the ship.

column2: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.
column3: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
column3: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

column2: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
column3: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: I'm not expecting a lot of defenders, Commander, but there are likely to be turrets. There's a bonus if we wipe out the base garrison as well; that's your call, as the situation on the ground develops.
column3: I'm not expecting a lot of defenders, Commander, but there are likely to be turrets. There's a bonus if we wipe out the base garrison as well; that's your call, as the situation on the ground develops.

column2: Destroy the Smuggler Base
column3: Destroy the Smuggler Base

column2: Destroy Pirate Garrison
column3: Destroy Pirate Garrison

column2: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets
column3: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets

column2: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets
column3: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets

column2: Destroy Enemy Reinforcements
column3: Destroy Enemy Reinforcements

column2: Alright Commander. Let's hope Cleese sticks to his word. Else you could be in for trouble.

column2: Sensors show him in this area.

column2: Keep him off balance. And be careful, Commander. Good hunting.

column2: Let's hope this guy is true to his word Commander. Good Luck.

column2: Defeat The Black Knight
column3: Defeat The Black Knight

column2: Meet The Black Knight One on One on the field of battle. Test your metal against his for your freedom and the Avatar.
column3: Meet The Black Knight One on One on the field of battle. Test your metal against his for your freedom and the Avatar.

column2: A Knight at the Omni III
column3: A Knight at the Omni III

column2: Alright Commander, we've decided to drop the hammer on Cleese.
column3: Alright Commander, we've decided to drop the hammer on Cleese.

column2: We're certain he's in this area. Looks like he guessed we'd not play by the rules.
column3: We're certain he's in this area. Looks like he guessed we'd not play by the rules.

column2: Engage and destroy him. Along with any supporting units he brought along. Good luck, Commander.
column3: Engage and destroy him. Along with any supporting units he brought along. Good luck, Commander.

column2: That's the kind of result I like to see. Good job, Commander.
column3: That's the kind of result I like to see. Good job, Commander.

column2: This is a disaster. I'm pulling us out. I'll let our employers know.
column3: This is a disaster. I'm pulling us out. I'll let our employers know.

column2: Readings indicate the reinforcements are out of commission. Good work Commander.
column3: Readings indicate the reinforcements are out of commission. Good work Commander.

column2: That's The Black Knight, sustain fire on that unit!
column3: That's The Black Knight, sustain fire on that unit!

column2: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
column3: Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.

column3: We're facing professionals, so we should expect disciplined opposition. Even if those tanks are ancient.

column2: We've picked up comm signals from this region, so that's where you should start looking.
column3: We've picked up comm signals from this region, so that's where you should start looking.

column3: Keep them off balance. And be careful, Commander. We don't get paid if the Mackie gets destroyed.

column3: Destroy Enemy Lance

column3: Commander, I still think it is a damn shame to let Wallo have that Mackie.

column2: I hope that was enough data for the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scientists.
column3: I hope that was enough data for the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} scientists.

column2: The primary targets are down, Commander. You can head back to the showroom at any time.
column3: The primary targets are down, Commander. You can head back to the showroom at any time.

column3: NO! I will not allow it. Commander you can't let them take the Mackie. Destroy them!

column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Wallo's expecting a good display. Let's not disappoint him as we take his pride and joy. Destroy his forces and make it to the LZ. Sumire is ready for a hot landing.

column2: Smooth Criminal I
column3: Smooth Criminal I

column2: We're tracking multiple units, Commander. That has to be our target.
column3: We're tracking multiple units, Commander. That has to be our target.

column2: Let's advance and get eyes on. Once we make contact, we need to strike quickly before the convoy escapes.
column3: Let's advance and get eyes on. Once we make contact, we need to strike quickly before the convoy escapes.

column2: Good luck, Commander.
column3: Good luck, Commander.

column2: Well done, Commander. Drinks are on me.
column3: Well done, Commander. Drinks are on me.

column2: That's a disappointing result, Commander.
column3: That's a disappointing result, Commander.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and capture the prize, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and capture the prize, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: Escorts are down, Commander. Good work. Let's wrap this up.
column3: Escorts are down, Commander. Good work. Let's wrap this up.

column2: The convoy's almost escaped, Commander. You need to step it up or we're going to miss the window of opportunity.
column3: The convoy's almost escaped, Commander. You need to step it up or we're going to miss the window of opportunity.

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: House Steiner isn't an easy target on the best of days. Stay sharp Commander.
column3: House Steiner isn't an easy target on the best of days. Stay sharp Commander.

column2: The objective for capturing the convoy units.
column3: The objective for capturing the convoy units.

column2: Capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy
column3: Capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Convoy

column2: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.
column3: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.

column2: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Escorts
column3: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Escorts

column2: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.
column3: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.

column2: Stop Convoy from Escaping
column3: Stop Convoy from Escaping

column2: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.
column3: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.

column2: Recon the Convoy's Route
column3: Recon the Convoy's Route

column2: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.
column3: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column3: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Reinforcements

column2: Commander, you need to intercept and capture the convoy before it can get to the research facility. Destroy it's escorts and any reinforcements that get in your way. I'm paying you handsomely to make sure my prize doesn't get away. Good luck.
column3: Commander, you need to intercept and capture the convoy before it can get to the research facility. Destroy it's escorts and any reinforcements that get in your way. I'm paying you handsomely to make sure my prize doesn't get away. Good luck.

column2: Smooth Criminal II
column3: Smooth Criminal II

column2: The repair facility is just ahead, Commander.
column3: The repair facility is just ahead, Commander.

column2: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
column3: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.

column2: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
column3: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.

column2: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
column3: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.

column2: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
column3: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.

column2: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
column3: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Sumire's inbound with our supplies. As soon as she's landed we can get to work.
column3: Sumire's inbound with our supplies. As soon as she's landed we can get to work.

column2: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
column3: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.

column2: We're battered after that last battle Commander. Secure the facility so we can get battle ready.
column3: We're battered after that last battle Commander. Secure the facility so we can get battle ready.

column2: Scout the Facility
column3: Scout the Facility

column2: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Garrison
column3: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Garrison

column2: Occupy the Facility
column3: Occupy the Facility

column2: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
column3: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

column3: Pacify the Area around the Base

column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Reinforcements

column2: Destroy Defensive Turrets
column3: Destroy Defensive Turrets

column2: Commander, we took some damage and need to repair. Also need to get those Annihilators up and running. We need both of them ready before we can take off. Secure the Repair facility so that Sumire can land and resupply us. Be careful of the bases defenses.
column3: Commander, we took some damage and need to repair. Also need to get those Annihilators up and running. We need both of them ready before we can take off. Secure the Repair facility so that Sumire can land and resupply us. Be careful of the bases defenses.

column2: Smooth Criminal III
column3: Smooth Criminal III

column2: As expected, Commander, it looks like this base is about to get hot.
column3: As expected, Commander, it looks like this base is about to get hot.

column2: We're tracking multiple incoming hostiles, unknown types.
column3: We're tracking multiple incoming hostiles, unknown types.

column2: Hold the base, keep the buildings upright, and then we get paid. Oliveira out.
column3: Hold the base, keep the buildings upright, and then we get paid. Oliveira out.

column2: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements are inbound, Commander. We're done here. Good job.
column3: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} reinforcements are inbound, Commander. We're done here. Good job.

column2: We're not going to be able to hold the base, Commander. Time to scrub the mission.
column3: We're not going to be able to hold the base, Commander. Time to scrub the mission.

column2: We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the personnel carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you. Keep the turrets online and we'll keep firing.
column3: We're in position! All engineers have disembarked from the personnel carriers. The APCs will scatter and support you. Keep the turrets online and we'll keep firing.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
column3: Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.

column2: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
column3: Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.

column2: Commander, half the base is in flames! If we lose another building, our employer's going to pull the plug on this contract.
column3: Commander, half the base is in flames! If we lose another building, our employer's going to pull the plug on this contract.

column2: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
column3: Mercenary Commander, we've received word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.

column2: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
column3: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.

column2: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.
column3: They have point defenses set up around the base, they are however offline.

column2: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
column3: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

column2: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!
column3: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good Luck!

column2: They're putting us between the hammer and the anvil, Commander. Those battlemechs are a juicy target.
column3: They're putting us between the hammer and the anvil, Commander. Those battlemechs are a juicy target.

column2: Defend Base from Attackers
column3: Defend Base from Attackers

column2: Defend 'Mech Repair Base
column3: Defend 'Mech Repair Base

column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Vanguard

column3: Ensure All Buildings Survive

column3: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

column3: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses

column3: Baddies Inbound

column3: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
