column2: The vile mercenary Yuetu is on her last legs. Cut them out from under her! Safeguard my beloved son, and prevent our enemies from destroying House Khulan. If you do, I will see to Reynauld's needs, and he in turn will see to yours.
column3: The vile mercenary Yuetu is on her last legs. Cut them out from under her! Safeguard my beloved son, and prevent our enemies from destroying House Khulan. If you do, I will see to Reynauld's needs, and he in turn will see to yours.

column2: Succession II
column3: Succession II

column2: Looks like we're in the right place, Commander. Lord Angus Khulan is hailing us.
column3: Looks like we're in the right place, Commander. Lord Angus Khulan is hailing us.

column2: Attention, incoming BattleMechs! You are trespassing on… wait. You're the brutes that Mother sent to kill Sister. Is Yvonne dead? Can I see the body?
column3: Attention, incoming BattleMechs! You are trespassing on… wait. You're the brutes that Mother sent to kill Sister. Is Yvonne dead? Can I see the body?

column2: I'm sorry to disappoint you, Brother. But I am not the Khulan who will die today.
column3: I'm sorry to disappoint you, Brother. But I am not the Khulan who will die today.

column2: You've sent them here, to the Red Roost? My poor, deluded sister. My bodyguards will crush them, and I will drink in the spectacle like a fine port wine. And then, when I tell Mother what you've done, she will—
column3: You've sent them here, to the Red Roost? My poor, deluded sister. My bodyguards will crush them, and I will drink in the spectacle like a fine port wine. And then, when I tell Mother what you've done, she will—

column2: Send more assassins? Threaten to disinherit me, and then rage against the laws that prevent her from doing so? There's nothing more that either of you can threaten me with, Brother. And now, your time has come.
column3: Send more assassins? Threaten to disinherit me, and then rage against the laws that prevent her from doing so? There's nothing more that either of you can threaten me with, Brother. And now, your time has come.

column2: I thank you again, Commander. My brother was a tick on House Khulan's back, draining our coffers and preying on our mother's diminished faculties. Now he is dead, his poisonous influence cut short, and I have you to thank.
column3: I thank you again, Commander. My brother was a tick on House Khulan's back, draining our coffers and preying on our mother's diminished faculties. Now he is dead, his poisonous influence cut short, and I have you to thank.

column2: You can thank us by lending Shugo Yamaguchi your support, like you promised you would.
column3: You can thank us by lending Shugo Yamaguchi your support, like you promised you would.

column2: I haven't forgotten our arrangement, Mr. Oliveira. I am indebted to your company, and as a fellow mercenary, I fully understand the importance of managing my debts. When you speak with Shugo Yamaguchi, I will reaffirm my commitment to supporting him.
column3: I haven't forgotten our arrangement, Mr. Oliveira. I am indebted to your company, and as a fellow mercenary, I fully understand the importance of managing my debts. When you speak with Shugo Yamaguchi, I will reaffirm my commitment to supporting him.

column2: We can't compete with what Lord Angus is fielding, Boss. Yuetu's gonna have to find someone else to bury her brother, 'cause our job here is done.
column3: We can't compete with what Lord Angus is fielding, Boss. Yuetu's gonna have to find someone else to bury her brother, 'cause our job here is done.

column2: Brace yourself, Commander. We've got more Khulan bodyguards entering the AO.
column3: Brace yourself, Commander. We've got more Khulan bodyguards entering the AO.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
column3: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

column2: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
column3: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: It is done. My brother is dead, entombed in the rubble of his own sanctuary. When I inherit the governorship, I think I'll enshrine it in bronze and marble. A memorial to the follies of ambitious men.
column3: It is done. My brother is dead, entombed in the rubble of his own sanctuary. When I inherit the governorship, I think I'll enshrine it in bronze and marble. A memorial to the follies of ambitious men.

column2: Nice shot, Commander! That's all of House Khulan's bodyguards down.
column3: Nice shot, Commander! That's all of House Khulan's bodyguards down.

column2: We're taking a gamble on this one, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. But given our options, it's one that I can live with.
column3: We're taking a gamble on this one, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. But given our options, it's one that I can live with.

column3: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

column3: Destroy the Red Roost

column3: The primary objective to destroy the garrison / defenders of the base.

column3: Destroy Lord Angus Khulan's Bodyguards

column3: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets

column3: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets

column3: Destroy Bodyguard Reinforcements

column2: Proceed to the Evac Zone
column3: Proceed to the Evac Zone

column2: You'll find my brother waiting for you at the Red Roost. It looks like a commercial office park, but don't be fooled. The structure is reinforced to withstand military payloads. Engage my brother's security team and raze the Red Roost. Let his stronghold serve as his tomb!
column3: You'll find my brother waiting for you at the Red Roost. It looks like a commercial office park, but don't be fooled. The structure is reinforced to withstand military payloads. Engage my brother's security team and raze the Red Roost. Let his stronghold serve as his tomb!

column2: Tournament of Champions
column3: Tournament of Champions

column2: MECHWARRIORS! You stand alone in the carcass of an abandoned city. This sepulchre of commerce is now reborn as a hunting ground and field of battle, all at the command of my master, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!
column3: MECHWARRIORS! You stand alone in the carcass of an abandoned city. This sepulchre of commerce is now reborn as a hunting ground and field of battle, all at the command of my master, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!

column2: You honor me, Gigante! I am pleased. To our guests, I bid you welcome! Ready yourselves to test your might in my TOURNAMENT OF CHAMPIONS!
column3: You honor me, Gigante! I am pleased. To our guests, I bid you welcome! Ready yourselves to test your might in my TOURNAMENT OF CHAMPIONS!

column2: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, today your lance will face off against four of the deadliest killers the Rimward Periphery has to offer. Two of these terrors stand before you now; the rest lurk in the shadows like predators on the hunt, waiting for an exposed flank or a bared throat. If you drop your guard, they'll eat you alive.
column3: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, today your lance will face off against four of the deadliest killers the Rimward Periphery has to offer. Two of these terrors stand before you now; the rest lurk in the shadows like predators on the hunt, waiting for an exposed flank or a bared throat. If you drop your guard, they'll eat you alive.

column2: They won't get the chance, Professor Horvat. I will butcher these amateurs before your \"lurking predators\" even show their faces. I am the Terror of Fronc! The Scourge of Sacromonte! I AM \"LIMPET\" SAITO!
column3: They won't get the chance, Professor Horvat. I will butcher these amateurs before your "lurking predators" even show their faces. I am the Terror of Fronc! The Scourge of Sacromonte! I AM "LIMPET" SAITO!

column2: And I'm his brother, Jake!
column3: And I'm his brother, Jake!

column2: Gods. This is like something out of a Brock Armstrong flick.
column3: Gods. This is like something out of a Brock Armstrong flick.

column2: I know! It's great!
column3: I know! It's great!

column2: And so, the table is set. At one end, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}'s battle-hardened mercenaries. At the other, a throng of deadly lone wolves, each bound to the other by their shared lust for victory! Let the air be filled with the bark of autocannon fire! Let the ground THUNDER with your approach! LET THE TOURNAMENT BEGIN!
column3: And so, the table is set. At one end, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}'s battle-hardened mercenaries. At the other, a throng of deadly lone wolves, each bound to the other by their shared lust for victory! Let the air be filled with the bark of autocannon fire! Let the ground THUNDER with your approach! LET THE TOURNAMENT BEGIN!

column2: Well done, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! Very well done indeed. You have taken this round and vanquished your foes.
column3: Well done, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! Very well done indeed. You have taken this round and vanquished your foes.

column2: I haven't tapped out yet, Horvat! You'll never hear me yield!
column3: I haven't tapped out yet, Horvat! You'll never hear me yield!

column2: You don't need to yield. You've lost. And you'll be spending the remainder of this tournament in a holding cell.
column3: You don't need to yield. You've lost. And you'll be spending the remainder of this tournament in a holding cell.

column2: Thank you, Gigante. To this round's victors, I invite you to bask in your triumph, but prepare yourselves. Tomorrow, you face the ultimate challenge. Tomorrow, your true test begins!
column3: Thank you, Gigante. To this round's victors, I invite you to bask in your triumph, but prepare yourselves. Tomorrow, you face the ultimate challenge. Tomorrow, your true test begins!

column2: Primary targets destroyed Commander.
column3: Primary targets destroyed Commander.

column2: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.
column3: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.

column2: Heads up, Commander. That Drop Pod must belong to the \"wild card\" contestant that Horvat warned us about.
column3: Heads up, Commander. That Drop Pod must belong to the "wild card" contestant that Horvat warned us about.

column2: Very perceptive, Ms. Meyer! I caught this young lady snooping around the tournament grounds. She claims that I'm responsible for the death of her father.
column3: Very perceptive, Ms. Meyer! I caught this young lady snooping around the tournament grounds. She claims that I'm responsible for the death of her father.

column2: You are responsible, you son of a bitch! And by my hand, he will be avenged!
column3: You are responsible, you son of a bitch! And by my hand, he will be avenged!

column2: I admire your grit, Ms. Jones. But if you want a shot at me, you'll need to fight your way out of the arena first. Kill or be killed! Let the games continue!
column3: I admire your grit, Ms. Jones. But if you want a shot at me, you'll need to fight your way out of the arena first. Kill or be killed! Let the games continue!

column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: Let the people of Fronc sleep easy! THE BROTHERS SAITO ARE DEAD!
column3: Let the people of Fronc sleep easy! THE BROTHERS SAITO ARE DEAD!

column2: My master's would-be assassin has fallen, but still she lives! Her ejection pod has saved her… but for how long?
column3: My master's would-be assassin has fallen, but still she lives! Her ejection pod has saved her… but for how long?

column2: Behold, Professor! Basilisk Jackson and his silent partner are down, their BattleMechs shattered, their bodies torn to bloody rags!
column3: Behold, Professor! Basilisk Jackson and his silent partner are down, their BattleMechs shattered, their bodies torn to bloody rags!

column2: It's glorious, Gigante. A display fit for a king.

column2: Behold, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! The stalking predators reveal themselves!

column2: You've got that right, Professor. I'm Basilisk Jackson, and I'm the meanest MechJock on this or any other planet! I'm gonna put these fools in the ground!

column2: Welcome to my Tournament, Commander. Here you will prove your mettle against the Periphery's fiercest champions. Today, your MechWarriors will demonstrate their worth using only the simplest of tools: the UrbanMech. Like a huntsman's spear, it is an instrument with a single purpose. Wield it skillfully, and ascend into triumph.
column3: Welcome to my Tournament, Commander. Here you will prove your mettle against the Periphery's fiercest champions. Today, your MechWarriors will demonstrate their worth using only the simplest of tools: the UrbanMech. Like a huntsman's spear, it is an instrument with a single purpose. Wield it skillfully, and ascend into triumph.

column2: Tournament of Champions II
column3: Tournament of Champions II

column2: Challengers! You have already proven your might in the arena. Now, you will show Professor Horvat your fortitude.
column3: Challengers! You have already proven your might in the arena. Now, you will show Professor Horvat your fortitude.

column2: Indeed they will, Gigante. Indeed they will. Contestants, I call upon you to destroy your rivals! Smash their BattleMechs without hesitation or mercy, for only one of you may be crowned champion!
column3: Indeed they will, Gigante. Indeed they will. Contestants, I call upon you to destroy your rivals! Smash their BattleMechs without hesitation or mercy, for only one of you may be crowned champion!

column2: Gods, what a fighter! I yield to you, Commander—never since Calamar Gigante have I seen such awe-inspiring strength!
column3: Gods, what a fighter! I yield to you, Commander—never since Calamar Gigante have I seen such awe-inspiring strength!

column2: I weep with joy, for I am no longer alone.
column3: I weep with joy, for I am no longer alone.

column2: You've earned your million C-Bills, Commander. More than that, you've earned my respect. Meet me in orbit, that I may grant you your reward.
column3: You've earned your million C-Bills, Commander. More than that, you've earned my respect. Meet me in orbit, that I may grant you your reward.

column2: Primary targets destroyed Commander.
column3: Primary targets destroyed Commander.

column2: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.
column3: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.

column2: Competitors! You have shown yourselves worthy of the greatest honor this Tournament can bestow: the right to face off against the great man himself, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!
column3: Competitors! You have shown yourselves worthy of the greatest honor this Tournament can bestow: the right to face off against the great man himself, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!

column2: You've gotta be kiddin' me.
column3: You've gotta be kiddin' me.

column2: This is no joke, Mr. Virtanen! I have taken the field myself to put your warriors to their final test. If they defeat me, the prize purse is yours. Should they fail, I will grant them a most glorious death. En garde, Tournament finalists! Your fur-wreathed doom is at hand!
column3: This is no joke, Mr. Virtanen! I have taken the field myself to put your warriors to their final test. If they defeat me, the prize purse is yours. Should they fail, I will grant them a most glorious death. En garde, Tournament finalists! Your fur-wreathed doom is at hand!

column2: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} lance has arrived!
column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column2: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.
column3: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated, their BattleMechs torn to scrap. I'm afraid that your time in the Tournament has come to an end.
column3: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated, their BattleMechs torn to scrap. I'm afraid that your time in the Tournament has come to an end.

column2: Can't say I didn't warn you, Commander. Such a shame. We could've taken Horvat down together. Instead, you're walking away with nothing but a couple of dead pilots.

column2: Welcome to the final round of my Tournament, Commander. Today, your two finest pilots will face off against the cream of the Frontier MechWarrior community. This will be a battle like no other, a clash between veritable gods. I wish your fighters luck, Commander—and I promise you, they will need it.
column3: Welcome to the final round of my Tournament, Commander. Today, your two finest pilots will face off against the cream of the Frontier MechWarrior community. This will be a battle like no other, a clash between veritable gods. I wish your fighters luck, Commander—and I promise you, they will need it.

column2: Tournament of Champions II
column3: Tournament of Champions II

column2: So, {COMMANDER.Callsign}. You have elected to violate the rules of my Tournament. You've decided to kill me, perhaps? To take on the great hunter in his den?
column3: So, {COMMANDER.Callsign}. You have elected to violate the rules of my Tournament. You've decided to kill me, perhaps? To take on the great hunter in his den?

column2: Something like that.
column3: Something like that.

column2: What a welcome diversion this is! Truly glorious. I had intended to challenge your MechWarriors when the Tournament was finished, as is my custom—to put them to the final test. Instead, you've provided me with a full lance of quarry to hunt down and slaughter. We'll enjoy this, won't we, Gigante?
column3: What a welcome diversion this is! Truly glorious. I had intended to challenge your MechWarriors when the Tournament was finished, as is my custom—to put them to the final test. Instead, you've provided me with a full lance of quarry to hunt down and slaughter. We'll enjoy this, won't we, Gigante?

column2: As you say, Professor Horvat. When we enter the arena, I will personally rend these overconfident fools limb from quivering limb.
column3: As you say, Professor Horvat. When we enter the arena, I will personally rend these overconfident fools limb from quivering limb.

column2: There you have it, Commander. Something to look forward to. Between now and then, I present you with the remaining contestants of the Tournament of Champions. I'm sure that they'll keep you occupied until our Drop Pods arrive.
column3: There you have it, Commander. Something to look forward to. Between now and then, I present you with the remaining contestants of the Tournament of Champions. I'm sure that they'll keep you occupied until our Drop Pods arrive.

column2: You've done well, Commander. There's a small army of Federation freight captains out there who'll sleep a whole a lot easier tonight.
column3: You've done well, Commander. There's a small army of Federation freight captains out there who'll sleep a whole a lot easier tonight.

column2: Always a pleasure to do work for the MIIO. Speaking of which, I believe that you owe us a substantial amount of money.
column3: Always a pleasure to do work for the MIIO. Speaking of which, I believe that you owe us a substantial amount of money.

column2: Yes, ma'am, I do. And as soon as the MIIO finishes springing me from this prison cell, I'll be happy to settle up.
column3: Yes, ma'am, I do. And as soon as the MIIO finishes springing me from this prison cell, I'll be happy to settle up.

column2: Primary targets destroyed Commander.
column3: Primary targets destroyed Commander.

column2: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.
column3: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.

column2: Say goodbye to your MechWarriors, Commander. We'll bleed them like lambs, Gigante and I.
column3: Say goodbye to your MechWarriors, Commander. We'll bleed them like lambs, Gigante and I.

column2: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} lance has arrived!
column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column2: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.
column3: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
column3: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column2: Your MechWarriors lie dead at my feet, just as I promised! Now take the rest of your pathetic company and go. I have tested you, Commander, and you have been found wanting.
column3: Your MechWarriors lie dead at my feet, just as I promised! Now take the rest of your pathetic company and go. I have tested you, Commander, and you have been found wanting.

column2: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.

column2: Grace under fire, folks. Lay it on 'em!

column2: Professor Mencius Horvat is waiting for you in the Tournament arena. He expects you to play by his rules—to let him lead a pair of your MechWarriors like lambs to the slaughter. Instead, you're going to show him the kind of firepower that your company can really bring down. Destroy him, and the MIIO will reward you accordingly.
column3: Professor Mencius Horvat is waiting for you in the Tournament arena. He expects you to play by his rules—to let him lead a pair of your MechWarriors like lambs to the slaughter. Instead, you're going to show him the kind of firepower that your company can really bring down. Destroy him, and the MIIO will reward you accordingly.

column2: Prototype
column3: Прототип

column2: Here we are, XO—scenic New Jakobstad, the shiniest combat zone on Fagerholm. I've got Bravo Lance on the comms, and their Drop Pods are prepared to launch. Are you reading us, Ombra?
column3: Here we are, XO—scenic New Jakobstad, the shiniest combat zone on Fagerholm. I've got Bravo Lance on the comms, and their Drop Pods are prepared to launch. Are you reading us, Ombra?

column2: We read you, and we appreciate the assist. Our metal's been beaten to hell and back over the course of this deployment, and our meat isn't doing much better. Truth be told, I don't think we could survived another deployment without your help.
column3: We read you, and we appreciate the assist. Our metal's been beaten to hell and back over the course of this deployment, and our meat isn't doing much better. Truth be told, I don't think we could survived another deployment without your help.

column2: Your uncle Davinder had nice things to say about you. \"Woman of integrity,\" and all that.
column3: Your uncle Davinder had nice things to say about you. "Woman of integrity," and all that.

column2: He's an honorable man. We haven't always seen eye to eye, but he's sticking his neck out to help us, just like you are. When you're as beaten up as we are, that means a lot.
column3: He's an honorable man. We haven't always seen eye to eye, but he's sticking his neck out to help us, just like you are. When you're as beaten up as we are, that means a lot.

column2: Amen to that. I've been seeing double since that last head hit I took, and Conqueror's been bleeding from the ears for three days now. But has anyone from the 5th come to relieve me? To relieve any of us?
column3: Amen to that. I've been seeing double since that last head hit I took, and Conqueror's been bleeding from the ears for three days now. But has anyone from the 5th come to relieve me? To relieve any of us?

column2: Hell no, they haven't. And so here we are again, all loaded up in these busted-ass ceramic cocoons, getting ready to slam ourselves into the ground for the hundredth time.
column3: Hell no, they haven't. And so here we are again, all loaded up in these busted-ass ceramic cocoons, getting ready to slam ourselves into the ground for the hundredth time.

column2: Speaking of which, watch your head, Commander. We're prepped and ready to drop.
column3: Speaking of which, watch your head, Commander. We're prepped and ready to drop.

column2: The AO is clear, everybody. All hostile contacts down.
column3: The AO is clear, everybody. All hostile contacts down.

column2: Thank the gods for that. What a shitshow this is! First House Liao kicks in our door, then House Steiner comes flying in… what's next, the damned FedRats?
column3: Thank the gods for that. What a shitshow this is! First House Liao kicks in our door, then House Steiner comes flying in… what's next, the damned FedRats?

column2: Not if I can help it. We're going to find the Raven, grab it, and wipe out every trace of Black Caldera's research project. If there's nothing on Fagerholm worth fighting over, the Great Houses will pack up their toys and go home.
column3: Not if I can help it. We're going to find the Raven, grab it, and wipe out every trace of Black Caldera's research project. If there's nothing on Fagerholm worth fighting over, the Great Houses will pack up their toys and go home.

column2: INCOMING MESSAGE.
column3: INCOMING MESSAGE.

column2: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Please contact me when you reach a safe altitude. We need to talk.
column3: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Please contact me when you reach a safe altitude. We need to talk.

column2: Primary targets destroyed Commander.
column3: Primary targets destroyed Commander.

column2: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.
column3: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.

column2: I suggest that you vacate the AO immediately, Commander. The lance that I've just deployed is under orders to destroy any hostile 'Mechs it encounters, including yours.
column3: I suggest that you vacate the AO immediately, Commander. The lance that I've just deployed is under orders to destroy any hostile 'Mechs it encounters, including yours.

column2: Appreciate the warning, but we aren't going anywhere.
column3: Appreciate the warning, but we aren't going anywhere.

column2: Not without the prototype, eh? I know what you're here for, Oliveira. We're on the same mission, but for different masters.
column3: Not without the prototype, eh? I know what you're here for, Oliveira. We're on the same mission, but for different masters.

column2: I don't care what your mission is, Lyran. You aren't welcome here. Bravo Lance—light 'em up!
column3: I don't care what your mission is, Lyran. You aren't welcome here. Bravo Lance—light 'em up!

column2: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} lance has arrived!
column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column2: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.
column3: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: The AO is clear, we're still standing, and we've got you to thank for it. Would you mind covering us while we make our way to the evac point?
column3: The AO is clear, we're still standing, and we've got you to thank for it. Would you mind covering us while we make our way to the evac point?

column2: That's what we're here for, Viscacha. Don't worry; we'll watch your six.
column3: That's what we're here for, Viscacha. Don't worry; we'll watch your six.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Our bird is away, and we're clear of the AO. We owe you our lives, Commander.
column3: Our bird is away, and we're clear of the AO. We owe you our lives, Commander.

column2: No problem, Viscacha. Force Commander Singh will be pleased that you made it through.
column3: No problem, Viscacha. Force Commander Singh will be pleased that you made it through.

column2: That's it, Commander—we're done here. I'm ordering a full retreat.
column3: That's it, Commander—we're done here. I'm ordering a full retreat.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
column3: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column3: Heads up Commander, its a hostile {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} lance!

column3: Our Employer has kindly added destroying this group to our objectives. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.

column3: Heads up, Commander—we've got incoming Drop Pods. I've tracked their trajectory and marked their LZ on your screen.

column2: Capellan reinforcements?
column3: Capellan reinforcements?

column2: Lyrans. It looks like House Steiner has decided to join the party.
column3: Lyrans. It looks like House Steiner has decided to join the party.

column2: I hate parties.
column3: I hate parties.

column3: Inbound hostile Dropship detected, drop zone marked.

column3: Inbound hostile Dropship detected, drop zone marked.

column2: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's complete we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
column3: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We will provide support to achieve the primary objective. When it's complete we have orders to proceed to our Evac.

column2: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.
column3: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.

column3: Another member of Bravo Lance just went down! Looks like they managed to eject, but we can't risk this happening again!

column2: She's right, Commander. This mission is over if our Andurien friends go down. I suggest that you protect what's left of Bravo Lance at all costs.
column3: She's right, Commander. This mission is over if our Andurien friends go down. I suggest that you protect what's left of Bravo Lance at all costs.

column2: We've got 'Mechs on the ground, Commander. Ready to advance on the Capellans when you are.

column2: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once that's done head for Evac.
column3: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once that's done head for Evac.

column2: Copy that lance leader, welcome to the party.
column3: Copy that lance leader, welcome to the party.

column2: For your first deployment, you will take the field alongside Ombra and the rest of Bravo Lance. Together, you will sweep the AO for hostiles, eliminating any Capellan units you find along the way. Bravo Lance has endured a great deal of punishment over the past few months and will need your help to come through this deployment in one piece.
column3: For your first deployment, you will take the field alongside Ombra and the rest of Bravo Lance. Together, you will sweep the AO for hostiles, eliminating any Capellan units you find along the way. Bravo Lance has endured a great deal of punishment over the past few months and will need your help to come through this deployment in one piece.

column2: Prototype II
column3: Prototype II

column2: Okay, Commander. According to Ombra, this convoy will be carrying a black box with data on the locations of the stolen Raven and Black Caldera Defense's secret R&D lab.
column3: Okay, Commander. According to Ombra, this convoy will be carrying a black box with data on the locations of the stolen Raven and Black Caldera Defense's secret R&D lab.

column2: I'd expect any vehicle carrying such valuable data to be well defended, so keep your eyes open. We've never gone up against Black Caldera's security team, and we don't know what they're likely to be armed with.
column3: I'd expect any vehicle carrying such valuable data to be well defended, so keep your eyes open. We've never gone up against Black Caldera's security team, and we don't know what they're likely to be armed with.

column2: The odds are high that any transport you stop will issue a distress call. You're gonna want to bug out quick after you get what you came for, so I'm marking an evac zone on your map. Make your way there once you've finished the job.
column3: The odds are high that any transport you stop will issue a distress call. You're gonna want to bug out quick after you get what you came for, so I'm marking an evac zone on your map. Make your way there once you've finished the job.

column2: Convoy down, Commander! I've been in touch with Bravo Lance, and they're on their way to collect the data.
column3: Convoy down, Commander! I've been in touch with Bravo Lance, and they're on their way to collect the data.

column2: They'll contact us as soon as we reach a safe cruising altitude, and we can discuss next steps from there.
column3: They'll contact us as soon as we reach a safe cruising altitude, and we can discuss next steps from there.

column2: We're gonna have to scrub this one, Commander. I'll send our regrets to Force Commander Singh.
column3: We're gonna have to scrub this one, Commander. I'll send our regrets to Force Commander Singh.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.
column3: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: Black Caldera BattleMechs down, Commander. Focus your fire on those transports!
column3: Black Caldera BattleMechs down, Commander. Focus your fire on those transports!

column2: Our window of opportunity is closing, Commander. You need to stop those transports before they depart the AO.
column3: Our window of opportunity is closing, Commander. You need to stop those transports before they depart the AO.

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: Let's make this strike quickly, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Bravo Lance will be holding off the Capellans while we work, and I don't want to leave them out there any longer than I have to.
column3: Let's make this strike quickly, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Bravo Lance will be holding off the Capellans while we work, and I don't want to leave them out there any longer than I have to.

column2: The objective for destroying the convoy units.
column3: The objective for destroying the convoy units.

column2: Destroy the Black Caldera Convoy
column3: Destroy the Black Caldera Convoy

column2: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.
column3: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.

column2: Destroy the Convoy Guards
column3: Destroy the Convoy Guards

column3: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.

column2: Prevent the Convoy from Escaping
column3: Prevent the Convoy from Escaping

column3: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.

column3: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.

column3: Proceed to the evac zone

column2: Destroy Black Caldera Reinforcements
column3: Destroy Black Caldera Reinforcements

column2: According to Ombra, a Black Caldera convoy has been scheduled to pass through the badlands north of New Jakobstad. Engage the convoy and destroy it. Bravo Lance will then interface with the command vehicle's black box to obtain the location of the Raven prototype, as well as the R&D facility Black Caldera has been using to reverse engineer it.
column3: According to Ombra, a Black Caldera convoy has been scheduled to pass through the badlands north of New Jakobstad. Engage the convoy and destroy it. Bravo Lance will then interface with the command vehicle's black box to obtain the location of the Raven prototype, as well as the R&D facility Black Caldera has been using to reverse engineer it.

column2: Prototype III
column3: Prototype III

column2: Okay, Commander. According to our intel, the Raven is being stored in a dilapidated armory in this part of the city. The OpFor's unit strength is unknown, but I bet it'll be somewhere between \"a lot\" and \"way too much.\"
column3: Okay, Commander. According to our intel, the Raven is being stored in a dilapidated armory in this part of the city. The OpFor's unit strength is unknown, but I bet it'll be somewhere between "a lot" and "way too much."

column2: I don't doubt it. This prototype is the most valuable asset on Fagerholm; it's bound to be well protected. From this position, you should be able to get eyes on the facility. We can plan our attack from there.
column3: I don't doubt it. This prototype is the most valuable asset on Fagerholm; it's bound to be well protected. From this position, you should be able to get eyes on the facility. We can plan our attack from there.

column2: Caution is fine, but we're on a timetable here. Bravo Lance is waiting for us to get that Raven up and running so that they can carry out their part of the plan. We've got a lot riding on this mission, so let's get it done.
column3: Caution is fine, but we're on a timetable here. Bravo Lance is waiting for us to get that Raven up and running so that they can carry out their part of the plan. We've got a lot riding on this mission, so let's get it done.

column2: That's it, Boss! The armory is ours. If you'll excuse me, I'm gonna go take a look at that Raven. I have to learn what I can about it before we can put it in the field.
column3: That's it, Boss! The armory is ours. If you'll excuse me, I'm gonna go take a look at that Raven. I have to learn what I can about it before we can put it in the field.

column2: Two heads are better than one, Yang. I'll meet you in the Mech Lab.
column3: Two heads are better than one, Yang. I'll meet you in the Mech Lab.

column2: Study it quick, you two. We've got a limited window to support Bravo Lance, and we need that Raven to do it.
column3: Study it quick, you two. We've got a limited window to support Bravo Lance, and we need that Raven to do it.

column2: Roger that, XO. We'll have it ready for them in no time.
column3: Roger that, XO. We'll have it ready for them in no time.

column2: We've lost this one, Commander. I'm pulling us out of here. The Great Houses are going to have to fight this out among themselves.
column3: We've lost this one, Commander. I'm pulling us out of here. The Great Houses are going to have to fight this out among themselves.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Heads up, Commander! I'm touching down now!
column3: Heads up, Commander! I'm touching down now!

column2: Commander, a word of warning—we've got reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning—we've got reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, Boss. Just keep an eye out, in case they're online.
column3: Turrets, Boss. Just keep an eye out, in case they're online.

column2: There it is, Boss—we've found the Black Caldera armory. This is where we'll find the Raven—assuming we can get to it, that is.
column3: There it is, Boss—we've found the Black Caldera armory. This is where we'll find the Raven—assuming we can get to it, that is.

column2: Ombra died for this, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. It's on us to make sure that her sacrifice counts for something.
column3: Ombra died for this, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. It's on us to make sure that her sacrifice counts for something.

column3: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

column2: Eliminate Base Turrets
column3: Eliminate Base Turrets

column2: According to the intel we found, Black Caldera Defense is storing their stolen Raven prototype at an old armory in southern New Jakobstad. We need to capture the base and recover the prototype. Conqueror, Viscacha, and Peregrine will be standing by to carry out the second half of the operation when we're done.
column3: According to the intel we found, Black Caldera Defense is storing their stolen Raven prototype at an old armory in southern New Jakobstad. We need to capture the base and recover the prototype. Conqueror, Viscacha, and Peregrine will be standing by to carry out the second half of the operation when we're done.

column2: Prototype IV
column3: Prototype IV

column2: This is it, Commander. The Black Caldera facility should lie just ahead of us.
column3: This is it, Commander. The Black Caldera facility should lie just ahead of us.

column2: Guess it's time to see whether the Raven's anti-IDF capabilities are everything they're cracked up to be. If they aren't, this is gonna be a short trip.
column3: Guess it's time to see whether the Raven's anti-IDF capabilities are everything they're cracked up to be. If they aren't, this is gonna be a short trip.

column2: It'll work. The Great Houses wouldn't all be fighting over this prototype if it were a dud. Now I say that we get in there and blow that facility to hell, and that we do it in Ombra's name.
column3: It'll work. The Great Houses wouldn't all be fighting over this prototype if it were a dud. Now I say that we get in there and blow that facility to hell, and that we do it in Ombra's name.

column2: Best of luck, Bravo Lance. When the job is done, I'll be waiting to bring you home.
column3: Best of luck, Bravo Lance. When the job is done, I'll be waiting to bring you home.

column2: Excellent work all around, people. Hang on tight, and I'll get you out of there.
column3: Excellent work all around, people. Hang on tight, and I'll get you out of there.

column2: Can't happen fast enough, Meyer. I think I can speak for all of us when I say that we're more than ready to get the hell off this planet.
column3: Can't happen fast enough, Meyer. I think I can speak for all of us when I say that we're more than ready to get the hell off this planet.

column2: This nut is too tough for us to crack, Commander. I'm pulling our people out.
column3: This nut is too tough for us to crack, Commander. I'm pulling our people out.

column2: Keep your eyes peeled, Bravo Lance. Black Caldera is bound to have more 'Mechs in the area, and they're likely to call 'em in any second now.
column3: Keep your eyes peeled, Bravo Lance. Black Caldera is bound to have more 'Mechs in the area, and they're likely to call 'em in any second now.

column2: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
column3: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

column2: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
column3: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

column2: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
column3: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

column2: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
column3: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

column2: Placeholder - this dialogue is automatically replaced by the Sensor Warfare popup. The guid in data/constants/CombatGameConstants must match the guid in data/contracts/destroybase/DestroyBase_RavenTutorial_Template
column3: Placeholder - this dialogue is automatically replaced by the Sensor Warfare popup. The guid in data/constants/CombatGameConstants must match the guid in data/contracts/destroybase/DestroyBase_RavenTutorial_Template

column2: That's it, Commander! The facility is down, and BCD's research on the Raven project has gone down with it!
column3: That's it, Commander! The facility is down, and BCD's research on the Raven project has gone down with it!

column2: Good riddance.
column3: Good riddance.

column2: Handle this and we're done here, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.
column3: Handle this and we're done here, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.

column3: The objective to destroy the targeted buildings.

column3: Destroy the Black Caldera R&D Facility

column3: HIDDEN Objective: Destroy Base Turrets

column3: The objective for the player to extract their units.

column3: Proceed to the evac zone

column2: According to the intel we found, Black Caldera's hardened R&D facility is protected by a phalanx of LRM batteries. Using the Raven's unique capabilities, you will protect Bravo Lance from these weapons while leading them to destroy the facility.
column3: According to the intel we found, Black Caldera's hardened R&D facility is protected by a phalanx of LRM batteries. Using the Raven's unique capabilities, you will protect Bravo Lance from these weapons while leading them to destroy the facility.

column2: Yang Virtanen's Big Score
column3: Yang Virtanen's Big Score

column2: The hangar's just ahead, Commander. I'm picking up a lot of BattleMech activity out front.
column3: The hangar's just ahead, Commander. I'm picking up a lot of BattleMech activity out front.

column2: Unknown BattleMech lance, be advised that you're trespassing on protected territory. Turn back now, or you will be destroyed.
column3: Unknown BattleMech lance, be advised that you're trespassing on protected territory. Turn back now, or you will be destroyed.

column2: So much for the element of surprise. Let's do what we came here for, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Take 'em out and capture that hangar!
column3: So much for the element of surprise. Let's do what we came here for, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Take 'em out and capture that hangar!

column2: The hangar is defenseless, and it looks like Graves is taking the bait. Long-range sensors are picking up activity out by his showroom.
column3: The hangar is defenseless, and it looks like Graves is taking the bait. Long-range sensors are picking up activity out by his showroom.

column2: That's my cue, then. I'll get a lance of MechWarriors together to infiltrate the showroom.
column3: That's my cue, then. I'll get a lance of MechWarriors together to infiltrate the showroom.

column2: INCOMING TRANSMISSION.
column3: INCOMING TRANSMISSION.

column2: I don't understand you people. You've captured my aerospace hangar and now you're… what? Running away?
column3: I don't understand you people. You've captured my aerospace hangar and now you're… what? Running away?

column2: Looks that way. Word to the wise: Graves's security team will be coming along any second now. If you don't want them tearing that hangar down around you, I'd recommend moving your Griffin components out to the front yard.
column3: Looks that way. Word to the wise: Graves's security team will be coming along any second now. If you don't want them tearing that hangar down around you, I'd recommend moving your Griffin components out to the front yard.

column2: I'd also recommend that you password-protect your security cameras, 'cause your security team doesn't have the faintest idea what it's doing.
column3: I'd also recommend that you password-protect your security cameras, 'cause your security team doesn't have the faintest idea what it's doing.

column2: I appreciate the warning, Miss…?
column3: I appreciate the warning, Miss…?

column2: Call me Sam. And I notice you've got a nearly completed Achilles in there. I'm a thief, not a monster; I don't want to see a marvel like that get destroyed.
column3: Call me Sam. And I notice you've got a nearly completed Achilles in there. I'm a thief, not a monster; I don't want to see a marvel like that get destroyed.

column2: That's very kind of you, Sam. Hell, it's downright cordial. I'll try to keep this little exchange in mind the next time we meet. Because there will be a next time, Sam. And when it comes, I'll be the one holding the cards.
column3: That's very kind of you, Sam. Hell, it's downright cordial. I'll try to keep this little exchange in mind the next time we meet. Because there will be a next time, Sam. And when it comes, I'll be the one holding the cards.

column2: Well, that didn't go the way I wanted it to. I guess we're done?
column3: Well, that didn't go the way I wanted it to. I guess we're done?

column2: Yeah, Yang. We're done.
column3: Yeah, Yang. We're done.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Leopard inbound, Commander. I'll be touching down directly.
column3: Leopard inbound, Commander. I'll be touching down directly.

column2: Careful, Boss. Wallo's security team just powered up a whole bunch of turrets.
column3: Careful, Boss. Wallo's security team just powered up a whole bunch of turrets.

column2: I've got eyes on the hangar, Commander. And what's more, Farah's gotten me access to Wallo's internal security cameras.
column3: I've got eyes on the hangar, Commander. And what's more, Farah's gotten me access to Wallo's internal security cameras.

column2: They weren't even encrypted! For a security company, these SSI people aren't very good.
column3: They weren't even encrypted! For a security company, these SSI people aren't very good.

column2: You can say that again. I'm taking a look inside. Wallo's got something big in there, but I can't quite make out… oh. Oh, wooooow!
column3: You can say that again. I'm taking a look inside. Wallo's got something big in there, but I can't quite make out… oh. Oh, wooooow!

column2: Don't leave us in suspense, Meyer. What are you looking at in there?
column3: Don't leave us in suspense, Meyer. What are you looking at in there?

column2: A thing of beauty, XO. He's got about 80 percent of a Galileo Instruments Achilles up on blocks in there. It's an absolute monster of a DropShip, more than twice as big as our Leopard, and it's armed like a WarShip to boot.
column3: A thing of beauty, XO. He's got about 80 percent of a Galileo Instruments Achilles up on blocks in there. It's an absolute monster of a DropShip, more than twice as big as our Leopard, and it's armed like a WarShip to boot.

column2: Then we should be relieved it's up on blocks. Let's get this show back on the road, Commander. The sooner we wipe out Wallo's guards, the sooner we can move on Graves's showroom.
column3: Then we should be relieved it's up on blocks. Let's get this show back on the road, Commander. The sooner we wipe out Wallo's guards, the sooner we can move on Graves's showroom.

column2: Let's hope this heist works out the way Yang said that it would.
column3: Let's hope this heist works out the way Yang said that it would.

column2: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
column3: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

column3: Scout the Hangar

column3: Eliminate Base Turrets

column2: Wallo's got a mercenary company on retainer to protect his private aerospace hangar, the imaginatively named \"Security Solutions, Inc.\" I looked 'em up, and they're the real deal—they've got combat vehicles, BattleMechs, the works. But we'll have the element of surprise on our side, given that Wallo's never heard of us. That's something, right?
column3: Wallo's got a mercenary company on retainer to protect his private aerospace hangar, the imaginatively named "Security Solutions, Inc." I looked 'em up, and they're the real deal—they've got combat vehicles, BattleMechs, the works. But we'll have the element of surprise on our side, given that Wallo's never heard of us. That's something, right?

column2: Yang Virtanen's Big Score II
column3: Yang Virtanen's Big Score II

column2: Commander, we've got problems down here. Graves's security team is closing in on us, and we're gonna have to fight our way out.
column3: Commander, we've got problems down here. Graves's security team is closing in on us, and we're gonna have to fight our way out.

column2: I've looked them up. It's another paramilitary security team, \"Paladin Protection LLC.\"
column3: I've looked them up. It's another paramilitary security team, "Paladin Protection LLC."

column2: There's a name to inspire terror in the mercenary heart. Give 'em hell, Commander. When the AO is clear, I'll head on down to pick up our new 'Mechs.
column3: There's a name to inspire terror in the mercenary heart. Give 'em hell, Commander. When the AO is clear, I'll head on down to pick up our new 'Mechs.

column2: Now that's what I call a heist! Four beautiful 'Mechs, and all for the bargain price of two short combat drops and a couple of pissed-off rich guys. Honestly, Boss, you should let me plan our deployments more often.
column3: Now that's what I call a heist! Four beautiful 'Mechs, and all for the bargain price of two short combat drops and a couple of pissed-off rich guys. Honestly, Boss, you should let me plan our deployments more often.

column2: Might wanna hold off on that gloating, Yang—we've got a problem. You remember that Achilles-class DropShip we saw in Wallo's hangar? The one that was up on blocks, and nowhere near ready for launch?
column3: Might wanna hold off on that gloating, Yang—we've got a problem. You remember that Achilles-class DropShip we saw in Wallo's hangar? The one that was up on blocks, and nowhere near ready for launch?

column2: Yeah?
column3: Yeah?

column2: It's right on top of us. You'd better get in here, Commander. Wallo wants to talk.
column3: It's right on top of us. You'd better get in here, Commander. Wallo wants to talk.

column2: That's the last of 'em, Commander. Graves's security team is down.
column3: That's the last of 'em, Commander. Graves's security team is down.

column2: And I'm on my way to pick you up. Get moving! I'll meet you at the LZ.
column3: And I'm on my way to pick you up. Get moving! I'll meet you at the LZ.

column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column3: Our Employer has kindly added this group to the contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
column3: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column2: Gods, this is awful. We've lost our new 'Mechs, I'm beat to hell, and Graves gets to keep the salvage. You ever had to eject while riding in a rumble seat, Boss? I don't recommend it.
column3: Gods, this is awful. We've lost our new 'Mechs, I'm beat to hell, and Graves gets to keep the salvage. You ever had to eject while riding in a rumble seat, Boss? I don't recommend it.

column2: You fought the good fight, Yang. Hang tight for pickup, then I'm getting us the hell out of here.
column3: You fought the good fight, Yang. Hang tight for pickup, then I'm getting us the hell out of here.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column2: Okay, Boss! We've got the hot rods, and we're on our way to the LZ. Did I mention that I still hate rumble seats? Boy, do I ever! You'd better get on the comms to guide us through this—we're moving at a solid clip, but I suspect we're being followed…
column3: Okay, Boss! We've got the hot rods, and we're on our way to the LZ. Did I mention that I still hate rumble seats? Boy, do I ever! You'd better get on the comms to guide us through this—we're moving at a solid clip, but I suspect we're being followed…

column2: Yang Virtanen's Big Score II
column3: Yang Virtanen's Big Score II

column2: Commander, we've got problems down here. Graves's security team is closing in on us, and we're gonna have to fight our way out.
column3: Commander, we've got problems down here. Graves's security team is closing in on us, and we're gonna have to fight our way out.

column2: I've looked them up. It's another paramilitary security team, \"Paladin Protection LLC.\"
column3: I've looked them up. It's another paramilitary security team, "Paladin Protection LLC."

column2: There's a name to inspire terror in the mercenary heart. Give 'em hell, Commander. When the AO is clear, I'll head on down to pick up our new 'Mechs.
column3: There's a name to inspire terror in the mercenary heart. Give 'em hell, Commander. When the AO is clear, I'll head on down to pick up our new 'Mechs.

column2: Now that's what I call a heist! Four beautiful 'Mechs, and all for the bargain price of two short combat drops and a couple of pissed-off rich guys. Honestly, Boss, you should let me plan our deployments more often.
column3: Now that's what I call a heist! Four beautiful 'Mechs, and all for the bargain price of two short combat drops and a couple of pissed-off rich guys. Honestly, Boss, you should let me plan our deployments more often.

column2: Might wanna hold off on that gloating, Yang—we've got a problem. You remember that Achilles-class DropShip we saw in Wallo's hangar? The one that was up on blocks, and nowhere near ready for launch?
column3: Might wanna hold off on that gloating, Yang—we've got a problem. You remember that Achilles-class DropShip we saw in Wallo's hangar? The one that was up on blocks, and nowhere near ready for launch?

column2: Yeah?
column3: Yeah?

column2: It's right on top of us. You'd better get in here, Commander. Wallo wants to talk.
column3: It's right on top of us. You'd better get in here, Commander. Wallo wants to talk.

column2: That's the last of 'em, Commander. Graves's security team is down.
column3: That's the last of 'em, Commander. Graves's security team is down.

column2: And I'm on my way to pick you up. Get moving! I'll meet you at the LZ.
column3: And I'm on my way to pick you up. Get moving! I'll meet you at the LZ.

column2: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Demonym} lance has arrived!
column3: The hostile {TEAM_HOST.FactionDef.Name} lance has arrived!

column2: Our Employer has kindly added this group to the contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.
column3: Our Employer has kindly added this group to the contract. If we want to get paid we need to take them out.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.
column3: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.
column3: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
column3: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.
column3: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

column2: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accordingly Commander.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.
column3: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column2: Gods, this is awful. We've lost our new 'Mechs, I'm beat to hell, and Graves gets to keep the salvage. You ever had to eject while riding in a rumble seat, Boss? I don't recommend it.
column3: Gods, this is awful. We've lost our new 'Mechs, I'm beat to hell, and Graves gets to keep the salvage. You ever had to eject while riding in a rumble seat, Boss? I don't recommend it.

column2: You fought the good fight, Yang. Hang tight for pickup, then I'm getting us the hell out of here.
column3: You fought the good fight, Yang. Hang tight for pickup, then I'm getting us the hell out of here.

column2: We're clear of the AO, thanks Commander.

column2: Okay, Boss! We've got the monster trucks, and we're slugging our way to the LZ. Did I mention that I still hate rumble seats? Boy, do I ever! You'd better get on the comms to guide us through this; we're trudging along at a steady pace, but we're about to have company…
